pages.text: A fuel made from plant material in a $(l:machines/crusher)Crusher$(/l).$(p)Used in a $(l:generators/bio_generator)Bio-Generator$(/l) (Mekanism:Generators required) for power or in a $(l:machines/prc)Pressurized Reaction Chamber$(/l) to produce $(l:chemicals/ethylene)Ethylene$(/l) and $(l:item/substrate)Substrate$(/l).
